title: Step Into Love
lyrics:
Step into love like you've never been hurt before
Step into trust like you've never been burnt before
Would you just step in your heart and open your soul?
I'll be waiting when you let go
Step into love like you've never been, never been hurt before

Go

Last year was so hard, I almost gave it up

But even Lazarus had hope, God, I pray You raise me up

It came to light who was in the dark, I don't know who to trust

So many actors who just want a part, they'll take a piece of us

But I can't let go, I tighten my grip

I hold on to hope, and fight to the end

People may change, God is the same, why would I quit?

I've been through the storm, live with the pain, but I'm still in



Step into love like you've never been hurt before

Step into trust like you've never been burnt before

Would you just step in your heart and open your soul?

I'll be waiting when you let go

Step into love like you've never been, never been hurt before



Don't you ever turn back, we not going that way

Tomorrow ain't ever promised, so let's not waste today

Heart broke, but I won't break

Can't find freedom, tryna escape

Going through, you gotta go through

The only way is when I find faith, yeah

"Come to Me," what He said to me

But all I see is this angry sea

Beyond the boat, where I think it's safe

But in Him, I can face the waves

Storm is real, I feel, but so is who I'm living for

Walk on water with the Father, know He'll carry me to shore

Every L is just another lesson

I refuse to live and second-guess Him

When I let Him down, they tried to take me down

But I ain't bring it up and I just tried to help, yeah

Step into love

I know that it's tough

I know He's in love

I ain't givin' up



You made it past all the past, you're a miracle

He's always there, cast your cares when it's difficult

Don't let your past hold you back, you're a miracle, miracle, miracle



Step into love like you've never been hurt before

Step into trust like you've never been burnt before

Would you just step in your heart and open your soul?

I'll be waiting when you let go

Step into love like you've never been, never been hurt before
